banner.text: An official website of the United States government
banner.aria_label: Official website of the United States government,

domain.heading: Official websites use .mil
domain.text: A .mil website belongs to an official U.S. Department of Defense organization.

https.heading: Secure .mil websites use HTTPS
https.posttext: or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .mil website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
